0.1.name: wordpress/development-theme
0.1.description:
Load a Theme for Administrator capability and some other theme for rest of users/visitors.

You can set which theme will be use visible for Administrator Role users while logged, and which theme will be use by rest of users or visitors.

It´s very easy, just install it, go to Development Themes Options page, choose your themes and save.

You can use this plugin basicly for two things:

- Put your site under maintenance, but let the Administrator be able to see and work the instaled theme.
- Test some new theme while rest of visitors still see the current one.
